# url

**Instance Property**

A URL to a Metal binary archive file.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can use this method to load a binary archive you created with an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBinaryArchive] instance’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBinaryArchive/serialize(to:)] method.
title: url
